error.2fa_empty: Please enter the correct two-factor verification code.
error.agree_terms: Please read and agree to the nmTeam Service Agreement and Privacy Policy.
error.email_verify_param_invalid:
The validation parameters are incorrect. 
Please check the URL and try again.
error.invalid_parameters: The parameter passed in is incorrect.
error.invalid_token: The validator passed in is incorrect.
error.used_mail: This email address is already in use.

ActiveAccount.error_tip:
Sorry, an error occurred and the activation of the nmTeam account failed. 
Please contact nmTeam support for assistance.
ActiveAccount.success_tip:
Congratulations! Your nmTeam account has been successfully activated. 
You can now log in to your nmTeam account and experience the nmTeam service.
ActiveAccount.tip:
Thank you for registering nmTeam account. 
We are doing the final work and you will be through the registration process shortly. 
Please wait while we activate your account...
ActiveAccount.title: Activating nmTeam Account

choose_account_page.new: Sign in with a new account
choose_account_page.tip: Select an nmTeam account already logged in on this device to continue logging in {oauth}.
choose_account_page.title: Switch Account

footer.copyright: Copyright Â© {year} nmTeam. All rights reserved.

step0.tip: If you forget your nmTeam Account password, you can reset it by verifying your email address. If you cannot access your email address, please contact nmTeam support for help.
step0.title: Reset nmTeam Account Password

step1.tip: Please check your email address that you registered nmTeam Account with, and get further instructions about resetting your password.
step1.title: Check Your Email

login_page.continue: and authorize {app} to access your account
login_page.title: Log In to Your nmTeam Account

not_found_page.tip: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check your URL or continue with the following operations.
not_found_page.title: Page Not Found

accept_terms.text: I accept the {terms} and {privacy} of nmTeam Account

register_page.success_tip: You should check your email for information on the next steps to register.
register_page.tip: Register a new nmTeam Account to start using nmTeam services.
register_page.title: Register

change_password.tip:
The longer and more complex your password, the less likely it will be guessed. 
You should also change your password regularly to further enhance your security.
change_password.title: Change Password

enable_2fa.tip: Enable 2-step verification to increase your account security.
enable_2fa.title: Enable 2-step Verification

level.medium: Your account is secure, but let's go a step further.

account_safety_block.stay_safe: Keep your account safe and secure
account_safety_block.stay_safe_text:
Account security is critical to the safe use of web services. 
Learn what you can do here to further keep your nmTeam Account safe.
account_safety_block.title: Account Security

2fa.disable_confirm: Are you sure you want to disable 2-step verification?
2fa.title: 2-step Verification

chosen.upload: The nmTeam service will display your uploaded images.

success.tip: You have successfully set an avatar! You may need to refresh the page and wait until you see your profile picture.

change_avatar.tip_0: Avatars are a great tool for showing off your personality.
change_avatar.tip_1: nmTeam account provides a variety of avatar setting methods for you to set an avatar and express yourself.
change_avatar.title: Set Avatar

type.gravatar_description:
Display a Gravatar avatar based on your email address. 
Gravatar is an amazing public service that allows users to use their own avatars on the Internet.
type.title: Show avatars from...
type.upload_description: This will upload an image from your device and use it as an avatar.

tip.t0: The number of digits in the password should be long enough.
tip.t1: Avoid easy-to-guess passwords like 12345678, asdfghjkl, mypassword or your birthday.
tip.t2: Include special characters such as - and _ in the password.
tip.t3: Avoid setting the same password on different websites, so that if one of them leaks, the rest of your accounts are no longer safe.
tip.t4: Do not store passwords in public documents or in unsafe places.
tip.t5: Regularly changing your password or enabling 2-step verification can further improve your account security.
tip.title: How to set a secure password

developers_will_love_nmteam_account.description: Use your nmTeam account in your own apps.
developers_will_love_nmteam_account.title: Developers will love nmTeam accounts too

help.description: nmTeam is happy to help you with your nmTeam account issues.
help.title: Get Help from nmTeam Support

index.title: Hello, {name}
index.welcome_text:
Welcome to the nmTeam account.
nmTeam account not only helps you log in to nmTeam services, but can also be used to verify your identity on third-party websites.

manage.logout_failed: Sorry, something went wrong and logout failed.
manage.not_found_alt: This page could not be found.

operates.logout_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out of all sessions?
operates.logout_confirm: Are you sure to log out this session?

tip.logout_unrecognized: If there is an unfamiliar session that you cannot identify, you should log out immediately, change your password, and set up other security measures (such as two-step verification) to ensure account security.
tip.manage_here: Here you can manage the currently logged in sessions of this account.

disable.tip: Please enter the 6-digit code on your device to confirm your action.

enabled.tip: You are safe! You have "two-factor verification" enabled.
enabled.title: Two-step verification enabled

app.code_not_expire: Please refer to the remaining time displayed in the app to ensure that the entered verification code has not expired.
app.enter_code: Please enter the verification code from the app here.
app.get_code_error:
Sorry, the verification code could not be obtained. 
Please refresh the page and try again.
app.scan_qrcode: Scan this QR code with a two-factor authentication app, or enter the code below.
app.set_error:
Sorry, setting up two-factor verification failed. 
Please refresh the page and try again.
app.title: Set up a two-factor authentication app

setup_2fa.tip_a: With 2-Step Verification enabled, even if an attacker obtains your password, they cannot gain access to your account.
setup_2fa.tip_b: Please set up "two-step verification" to further enhance account security.
setup_2fa.title: Set up Two-Step Verification
